Nothing in this Agreement intends to transfer any such IP Rights to You. Any unauthorized use of the IP Rights is a violation of this Agreement as well as a violation of intellectual property laws, including but not limited to copyright laws and trademark laws. 
By sending any information, material, ideas, concepts or techniques except for personal information to ASUS _through the Software (“Feedbacks”), You acknowledge and agree that: (i) Your Feedbacks shall not contain confidential or proprietary information; (ii) ASUS is under no obligation of any kind of confidentiality, express or implied, regarding the Feedbacks; (iii)ASUS shall be entitled to use or disclose, at ASUS’s sole discretion, the Feedbacks for any purpose, in any way, worldwide; (iv) Your Feedbacks shall become the property of ASUS without any obligation of ASUS to You; and (v) You are not entitled to any compensation or reimbursement of any kind from. 

F. TERM AND TERMINATION This Agreement will be effective as of the date You install the Software. All claims arising out of this Agreement shall be decided solely and exclusively by a binding arbitration, which shall be conducted in accordance with the rules of the Arbitration Association of the Republic of China, before a single arbitrator, in the City of Taipei.

string.name: pg_del_count
string.description: Show how many pages has been deleted

string.name: pg_move_count
string.description: Show how many pages has been moved

string.name: password_hint
string.description: Attention: (1) Password can be 4 to 7 position numbers and/or characters. (2) Change the password to 0000 will clear it and clear the Hide/Unhide function.

resources.string: Attention: password can be 4 to 7 position numbers and/or characters.

string.name: password_mail_content
string.description: On 2011/01/01 the password of my SuperNote was changed. The new password is: AAAA

resources.string: On %s, the password of my SuperNote was changed. The new password is: %s

string.name: choose_a_template
string.description: choose a template for your notebook

resources.string: Choose a template for your notebook

string.name: prompt_err_open
string.description: The open method associated with this file is not found

resources.string: The open method associated with this file is not found

string.name: prompt_restore_err
string.description: Restore failed. The file is corrupt.

resources.string: Restore failed. The file is corrupt.

string.name: prompt_import_err
string.description: Import failed. The file is corrupt.

resources.string: Import failed. The file is corrupt.

string.name: pg_selected
string.description: show how many pages are selected

string.name: memo_count
string.description: show how many memos in this view

string.description: the title of the page display property

string.name: page_counter
string.description: show the total page number the book has

resources.string: You are opening the wrong type of file

string.name: note_hide_hint
string.description: tell the user the book which is selected would be hide, and the book would only be seen in the private view

resources.string: Notebook is hidden in Private view now. All the Bookmark(s) in the Notebook will be remove from the Bookmark view.

string.name: prompt_move_pages
string.description: Long press on the page and drag to re-order pages.

Are you sure you want to delete all the drawings? This action cannot be undone.

Use your finger to move or resize the object
Tap to select or drag an object or multiple objects.
The memo image has been saved.

string.description: The password has not been set.

string.description: Show how many pages has been copied

string.description: the background style of the notebook

string.description: Show the information of the notebook [MAX=18]

string.description: You have not set up the password for hiding notes, please set up the password. [MAX=28]

resources.string: Please set up your password for hiding your notes.

string.name: memo_link
string.description: press this button to link the page where the memo from

string.name: no_book_exists
string.description: no book exists, notify the user to create a new book

string.description: no book exists, let user know there is no page existing

resources.string: No book or page for reading

string.name: no_bookmark_exists
string.description: no bookmark exists, let user know there is no page existing

resources.string: No book in the Private list.
Are you sure you want to delete this page?

string.name: page_empty
string.description: notify there is no page and please create a new notebook

string.name: latest_edit_page_info
string.description: the page number of the latest page, e.g. page 6

string.name: pg_title_counter
string.description: show total pages number of the all page view\'s title

resources.string: Do you want to delete the notebook?

string.name: notebook_selected
string.description: show how many pages are selected

resources.string: Account or password field cannot be empty
Notebooks saved on the cloud are organized as private and public. Do you want to create a password for the private notebooks? If not, then all notebooks will be organized as public.
You must reformat this book and the process may take some time. Do you want to continue?
%s is not a compatible version. Please update your SuperNote.
You need an Internet connection to use this service. Please enable your mobile network connection or Wi-Fi in Settings.
Logging out will remove access to notebooks on your cloud account and disable cloud syncing. Do you want to continue?\n

string.name: password_mail_confirm
string.description: Your password has been changed. Do you want to send your password to your email account for future reference? This will prevent loss of access to hidden notebooks.

resources.string: Your password has been changed. Do you want to send your password to your email account for future reference? This will prevent loss of access to hidden notebooks.\n

resources.string: Do you want to unlock the notebook?
Read mode only: you are in Read Mode. Use your finger to flip through or scroll up/down the page.

string.name: backspace_gesture_summary
string.description: In the handwriting mode, wave you hand from right to left to do backspace delete

resources.string: In Writing mode, finger-swipe from right to left to delete the last entered text.

string.name: show_personal_notebook
string.description: show the notebooks whick be locked

string.name: hide_personal_notebook
string.description: hide the notebooks whick be locked

resources.string: When your writing passes the red line, your written text would shift to the left automatically.
SuperNote recognizes and converts handwritten texts to typed texts, and these typed texts are duplicated as a new notebook.

string.name: webstorage_prompt_account
string.description: Prompts the user can log in by Asus Storage account.

resources.string: You can login using your ASUS WebStorage account.
The locked notebooks have been hidden
The locked notebooks can be read now
Write long word continuously regardless of screen size.

string.description: reason of failing to import book

resources.string: Notebooks are organized as private and public. Do you want to create a password for the private notebooks? If not, then all notebooks will be organized as public.
